channel.title: LFTC: MassaCre's Life at Leak-Free (Made by MassaCre)
channel.description:
Aside from [i]Attack of the Noobs[/i], MassaCre also made numerous short and sweet comics during his tenure at Leak-Free. Rather than make a seperate thread for each and every one of his "MassaCre's Life at Leak-Free" or "Leakians" shorts, I'll dump them here whenever I feel like posting one of them. Anyway, the first one up is titled [b][i]Stupid GMod On Wheels[/i][/b]:
[align=center][img]https://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2919/01kopiera3in.jpg[/img][/align]
